text:
e="preserve">Michael P. Reese (March 7, 1978 – January 2, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 2009 until his death in 2021. He was born in Mount Pleasant Township, Pennsylvania.
Reese died on January 2, 2021 in Greensburg, Pennsylvania from a brain aneurysm at the age of 42.
